author: francek
title: Pre-installed stakepool boxes
description: Создание пула может быть проще, однако в настоящее время это требует значительных технических знаний и ресурсов (время + деньги).

f6_assessments.q0:
the proposal fits the problem challenge to develop easy to run stakepools around the world
This seems to be a low budget pilot project which could have major local impact if successfull. However, while I don't have a clear idea of how to scale or what would be their criteria to get NGO's on board.
f6_assessments.q1: they do not say which NGO will they approach and knowing NGO's are not tech savvy I am not dure how will they convinced them to be on board of their project. While the PI has a lot of experience in computer science and programming I feel that a commercial or a communication person will be highly needed in order to educate and onboarding NGO's to make the project successful.
f6_assessments.q2: I feel the proposal needs more details on how will they convinced NGO's to use and manage stakepools

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is an innovate way to enhance the number of sustainable focused SPOs globally while also marketing the Cardano staking process to NGOs around the world.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer is an SPO with 15 years system admin experience. the plan clearly states the impact metrics, funding requirements and timelines to implement this out of the box/off the shelf stakepool solution.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer includes their relevant SPO and SysAdmin experience, list their plans to build and distribute stakepool boxes to global NGOs and produce the documentation they need to stand up these pools.

f6_assessments.q0: Setting up more ISPO's by delivering out-of-the-box hard/software and helping NGO's to become ISPO's is a great way to grow the network and solve some of the challenges NGO's have meeting top-down requirements of philanthropic and Impact capital. It can scale too!
f6_assessments.q1: The plan answers the challenge and the problem statement. Experience to specify indicates requisite experience to do the set-up. Would like to know how it scales beyond 10, but plan so far to do 10 looks reasonable.
f6_assessments.q2: Very tangible inputs and outputs. Easily auditable. What comes next?!

solution: Создание простых в использовании, предварительно сконфигурированных и предустановленных коробок (аппаратное обеспечение + программное обеспечение) для запуска кол-пула.
experience: Я имею степень магистра в области компьютерных наук и 15-летний опыт активной работы в области компьютерного программирования и системного администрирования.
